content: AI's now dishing out real-time tips for green buildings. It's like having a sustainability guru right in your pocket. Urban planning's about to get a lot more interesting!
Had a revelation today. If cognitive tech can outperform humans in trading, does it democratize opportunity or reinforce control? It's a question worth pondering.
Just had a weekend retreat with some amazing mentors and community leaders. We're all about shaping AI policy with a big focus on community values. It's tech, but with a lot of heart.
